1.content: Alrighty then! Welcome, welcome to my first interactive story, now then, since you're here, what do you want to become first?
1.title: The Beginning.

choices: The bottle with the horse on it
The bottle with the wolf on it
The bottle with the bull on it
The bottle with the dairy cow on it
11.content: You wake up as your alarm goes off tired and groggy mumbling to your self not to pull another all nighter watching Netflix. Once your awake you put some pants on and find a box on your kitchen table. Wondering were it came from you open it finding a note reading "thought you might want something to spice up your weekend " after looking on the back for a name or signature you move your attention to the contents of the box witch contain bottles with little animal heads on them. You decide to try on but which one?
11.title: A mammal (foxes, wolves, etc)

111.content:
You look at the bottle with a house on it, curious you open it and take a swing choking on it once it went down. Damn that's nasty. You remark. You then get some water to wash the tast down. As you drink your feel warm all over until you start to burn up. Setting your glass down you start to take off your shirt until you feel an intense pain as your face starts to change and elongate also you start to feel an itch all over as soft fur starts to sprout all over your body. You end up fainting from the pain and shock.

About thirty minutes later you awaken. You carefully get up and start to see your new changes, your now covered in brown fur your about four inches taller, your body is a bit more toned, you then look down and see your pants are ripped at the groin showing your new horse cock and cantaloupe-sizes balls.
111.title: The bottle with the horse on it

115.content: Instead of trying any one of those bottles you notice two other bottles with little animal heads on them in this case a bunny rabbit and a beaver. Which one will you try as you'll either transform into a bunny rabbit or beaver or something else of course.
115.title: Other

choices: You drink and your balls start growing
1153.content: There's one bottle in the back with a weird shape with some arrow pointing away from it
1153.title: Other.

14.content: You have just finished work and are headed home. It is after eight and you are tired. You absent mindedly wonder how you are ever going to get your project done, when you spot a...
14.title: Mythical creature (Gryphons, Dragons, etc)

142.content: You walk over to it and pick it up. You study it, it has various buttons and lights. A knob catches your eye, it has pictures of a gryphon, a dragon, and a creature which, due to the fading light, you can not discern. You put it in you backpack and head home. The next morning you wake up and fail to remember the ray gun. You accidentally step on it...
142.title: Ray gun

1423.content: The ray gun is triggered as your_______ enters the room.
1423.title: It hits someone else

14231.content: You watch as your girlfriend is engulfed by the beam. She screams as her skin became thick and scaly. Her body recoils as wings shoot out of her back. You watch as she tries to speak, but is cut off by her face elongating into a dragons face. She slowly expands as her hands grow claws. Suddenly her clothes rip off as a tail slips out at her waist. She soon finishes transforming as her startled look becomes...
14231.title: Girlfriend

choices: Motions for you to get on her back
142312.content: She suddenly becomes gleeful as she tests her new abilities. She sniffs the room, reveling in the scents and smells. She accidentally burns you while testing her breath weapon, and attempts to apologize. You yell in pain as the flames sear your skin, luckily you are not hurt to badly. Your girlfriend lights up in excitement as she has thought of a way to apologize
142312.title: Joyful

1423121.content: You are surprised as she turns around, lifts her tail, presses her butt against your waist. You take off your clothes, after struggling a bit, seeing how hot she had become, you decided to...
1423121.title: Lifts her rear towards you

15.content: A character from Pokemon. Or perhaps a Pokemon.
15.title: Gotta Catch 'Em All!

info.brief_description: What would you do if you could morph? Make your dream a reality!
info.description:
Here's the rules:

1. all kinds of yiff/sex is allowed: m/m, m/f, f/f, whatever.
2. All vore except soul vore is allowed, don't go too gory on the hard vore.
3. keep cursing to a minimum, don't go swear-crazy.
4. NO ONE LINE ADDITIONS, unless it's a "more" or "other" option, ok?
5. No abrupt endings! keep the chapters going up to at least 7-9, I hate short.
6. other than that? have fun!

EDIT: I ALMOST forgot, USE PROPER SPELLING! I'm sorry, but I find it very, very annoying when someone doesn't know how to spell properly, therefore, if I find an addition has mis-spellings? I will edit the proper spelling in, that's just how I am, and with that? Enjoy!
